faceitCooldownMessage.value: $username, not too fast! You need to wait $cooldownTimer seconds till you can use $command again
faceitCooldownMessage.label: Cooldown message
faceitCooldownMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when the user of a command is on cooldown

faceitPermissionMessage.value: $username, gotcha! You don't have permission to use $command
faceitPermissionMessage.label: Permission Error Message
faceitPermissionMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when the user of a command does not have permission to use it

faceitEloCommand.label: Command
faceitEloCommand.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit ELO check

faceitEloDefaultUser.label: Your faceit nickname (MANDATORY)
faceitEloDefaultUser.tooltip: This is the user the command is going to check when no param is included

faceitEloPermission.label: Permission
faceitEloPermission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceitEloPermissionSpecific.label: Specific User
faceitEloPermissionSpecific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

faceitEloCooldown.label: Cooldown (in seconds)
faceitEloCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on for.

faceitEloMessage.label: Message
faceitEloMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command.

faceitEloErrorMessage.value: $username, nice try, but $arg1's ELO is under a rock, 'cause I can't find it.
faceitEloErrorMessage.label: Error Message
faceitEloErrorMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command and there's an error.

resetSettings.label: Reset Settings
resetSettings.tooltip: Reset all settings for this plugin
